title: ICYMI - Lester Holt on Leaving the Anchor Desk Behind and Taking the News to Small-Town America
itunes:title: ICYMI - Lester Holt on Leaving the Anchor Desk Behind and Taking the News to Small-Town America
description:
"NBC Nightly News" anchor Lester Holt discusses the growing bipartisan call for criminal justice reform and his passion for reporting on stories that resonate across America.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
